notes: First Heisman Trophy winner (University of Chicago)
Led TCU to 11-0 record and national championship
Iowa's stadium renamed in his honor; died in WWII
Only Heisman winner from a team with a losing record
Only Heisman winner from South Carolina
First Black QB to win Heisman
First primarily defensive player to win
Set all-time rushing record at time
NCAA all-time rushing leader at time
Youngest Heisman winner at the time
Two-way player; first primarily defensive player since Woodson (1997)
